channel.title: [PI] NPC Diolouge Help! Rep++
channel.description:
Alright so I added this today in my server. (in ActionHandler.java and DiolougeHandler.java)
I added this in ActionHandler.java
[code]case 2244: c.getDH().sendDialogues(600,npcType); break;[/code]
In Diologue.java I added this:
[code]case 600: sendOption4("Edgeville", "Varrok", "Lumbridge", "Party Room"); c.dialogueAction = 600; break;[/code]
The question is: When I click on one of those places when I talk to the NPC, how do I teleport the player there?
In other words, if I clicked on the npc and selected one of the teleports on there, how to I get it to teleport me there?

item.title: [PI] NPC Diolouge Help! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Alright so I added this today in my server.
(in ActionHandler.java and DiolougeHandler.java)

I added this in ActionHandler.java

case 2244: c.getDH().sendDialogues(600,npcType); break;

In Diologue.java I added this:

case 600: sendOption4("Edgeville", "Varrok", "Lumbridge", "Party Room"); c.dialogueAction = 600; break;

The question is: When I click on one of those places when I talk to the NPC, how do I teleport the player there?

In other words, if I clicked on the npc and selected one of the teleports on there, how to I get it to teleport me there?

Read full topic
